Job Title

Job Description
Vanderlande is the global market leader for future\\-proof logistic process automation at airports and in the parcel market. Furthermore, we are also a leading supplier of process automation solutions for warehouses, which seamlessly integrate innovative systems, intelligent software and life\\-cycle services.  

What will you be doing?
The Integration Manager is part of the management of an airport and parcel project. Working closely with a project manager and project leaders of the various hardware\\- and software engineering disciplines, he or she focusses on the design, integration and testing of the system with special attention for managing the technical risks that are inherent to complex systems.
Vanderlande understands the complexities associated with operating a successful airport and parcel operation and delivers future proof logistic process automation. These automation systems are composed of many (electro\\-) mechanical and IT components, built by teams in various parts of the world and must be integrated with other (software) systems to support the processes of our customers.
Responsibilities
The key tasks and responsibilities of the integration manager:* Manage the functional design to ensure customer requirements are translated into the right solution with the lowest possible risks. Advise on the use of standard solutions and the impact of special solutions
* Identify risks and finding solutions to reduce them
* Realize the system integration plan, test plans and test specifications in collaboration with Solution Architect and Integration engineer(s)
* Manage the test phase and ensure a smooth, seamless transition to our customers operational processes together with the Integration Engineer and other engineering disciplines.
* Understand the customer processes and acting as advisor in correctly estimating the impact of changes
* Progress monitoring with clear, concise reporting
* Managing component deliveries by suppliers by means of verification and validation
* Integrating (sub\\-)systems in existing customer systems
* Make sure that the system after a careful testing phase is handed over according to specification by your colleagues and suppliers.


What do we ask from you?* You have a technical or logistics education, at least Bachelor level
* Preferably you are familiar with customer processes in Airport or Parcel Automation
* You are an experienced system integrator, and are familiar with systems engineering processes (requirement management, verification and validation, change management and configuration management)
* You know how to build partnerships with customers and with internal and external suppliers
* You know how to find the right balance between quality, lead time and cost
* You have well\\-developed analytical skills and you think at system level
* You are proactive and pragmatic
* You can motivate people at all levels and a teambuilder.
* You have good communication skills in English (written and verbal)
* You’re willing to travel, for about 50% of your time working on\\-site in the project handover phase


About the team
The System Integration department is part of the business unit Airport \\& Parcel Solutions within Vanderlande Industries and is responsible for the system design, testing and integration of complex Airport and Parcel systems worldwide for European customers like Schiphol, London Heathrow, DHL and Fedex but also for our International customers like JFK, Xi’an and Western Sydney Airport. The integration of all components (mechanical, electronic, OT software, IT software and IT Hardware) into a working system according to specifications is especially challenging for large and complex airports. This is the focus area of the System Integration Management\\-team.
What we offer
In the challenging and responsible position of Integration Manager, you will have the chance to make a significant contribution to industry\\-leading projects and be connected to our dedicated people and customers. We offer a position in an informal, international and professional working environment with a lot of scope for personal development. By joining our profitable and growing company you will be able to reach your goals and focus on your future.
This position offers a competitive salary. Through exceeding performance expectations, you even have the possibility to grow.
Your application
If the role of Integration Manager appeals to you, then please apply now by completing the application form, and uploading your CV and covering letter.
Diversity \\& Inclusion
Vanderlande is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. Qualified applicants will be considered without regards to race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, or disability status.
